statements: SELECT * FROM survey_results_survey;
SELECT survey_id, customer_id FROM survey_results_survey WHERE dissatisfaction_reason IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM survey_results_survey ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT survey_id, dissatisfaction_reason FROM survey_results_survey WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM survey_results_survey WHERE survey_date > '2022-01-01' AND survey_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM survey_results_survey WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT survey_id, dissatisfaction_reason FROM survey_results_survey WHERE survey_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM survey_results_survey WHERE dissatisfaction_reason IS NOT NULL ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS Total_Surveys FROM survey_results_survey GROUP BY customer_id HAVING Total_Surveys > 5;
SELECT DISTINCT dissatisfaction_reason FROM survey_results_survey WHERE dissatisfaction_reason LIKE '%poor%' ORDER BY dissatisfaction_reason ASC;
SELECT * FROM survey_results WHERE survey_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, dissatisfaction_reason FROM survey_results WHERE dissatisfaction_reason LIKE '%poor service%';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM dissatisfied_customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT survey_id, customer_id FROM survey_results WHERE dissatisfaction_reason IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM survey_results WHERE customer_id = 10 ORDER BY survey_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM survey_results WHERE survey_id = 1;
SELECT dissatisfaction_reason, customer_id FROM survey_results WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, contact_info FROM dissatisfied_customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT survey_id, customer_id FROM survey_results WHERE dissatisfaction_reason LIKE '%poor service%';
SELECT survey_id, customer_id, dissatisfaction_reason FROM survey_results WHERE survey_id > 1 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT survey_id, survey_date FROM surveys WHERE satisfaction_score >= 3 ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, answer_text FROM customers JOIN survey_answers ON customers.customer_id = survey_answers.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT customer_name, survey_date, satisfaction_score FROM customers c JOIN surveys s ON c.customer_id = s.survey_id;
SELECT customer_name, answer_text FROM customers c JOIN survey_answers sa ON c.customer_id = sa.customer_id;

SELECT c.customer_name, s.survey_date, sa.answer_text FROM customers c JOIN surveys s ON c.customer_id = s.survey_id JOIN survey_answers sa ON c.customer_id = sa.customer_id WHERE s.satisfaction_score > 4;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT reason_description FROM dissatisfaction_reasons;
SELECT question_text FROM survey_questions;
SELECT response_id, customer_id, satisfaction_rating, reason_for_dissatisfaction FROM survey_responses;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE satisfaction_rating > 3 ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT reason_description FROM dissatisfaction_reasons WHERE reason_id BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE reason_for_dissatisfaction IS NOT NULL ORDER BY response_id DESC;
SELECT question_text FROM survey_questions ORDER BY question_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_survey;
SELECT customer_id, satisfaction_rating FROM customer_survey WHERE satisfaction_rating > 3;
SELECT reason_name FROM dissatisfaction_reason ORDER BY reason_id DESC;
SELECT feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT question_text FROM survey_question WHERE question_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM customer_survey WHERE satisfaction_rating > 4 ORDER BY customer_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT survey_id, customer_id, satisfaction_rating FROM customer_survey WHERE reason_for_dissatisfaction IS NOT NULL AND satisfaction_rating < 3;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(survey_id) AS survey_count FROM customer_survey WHERE satisfaction_rating = 1 GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY survey_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM survey_question WHERE question_text LIKE '%customer%' ORDER BY question_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE LENGTH(feedback_text) > 50 ORDER BY customer_id ASC LIMIT 10;
